title: Mobile App Guide
author: Ekobol Mobile Team
image_caption: Manage your business on-the-go with Ekobol's mobile app.
intro: Access all of Ekobol's powerful features from your iOS or Android device. Manage products, track orders, respond to customers, and monitor sales - anytime, anywhere.
p1: Download the Ekobol mobile app to manage your business from your smartphone or tablet.
li1_text: iOS: Download from Apple App Store  (iOS 14.0 or later)
li2_text: Android: Download from Google Play Store (Android 8.0 or later)
li5_text: Log in with your Ekobol account credentials
p2: The mobile dashboard provides a quick snapshot of your business performance.
li6_text: Today's sales revenue and order count
p3: Tap 'Customize' to rearrange widgets and choose which metrics to display prominently.
p4: Add, edit, or remove products directly from your mobile device.
li12_text: Take or upload product photos from camera roll
li13_text: Fill in product details (title, price, SKU, description)
p5: Swipe left on any product in the list to quickly update price or stock, or swipe right to duplicate.
li17_text: Tap barcode icon to scan product barcodes
li18_text: Instantly look up products by barcode
p6: Fulfill orders, update statuses, and communicate with customers seamlessly.
li21_text: View order details: Tap any order to see full details
li22_text: Mark as fulfilled: Swipe right and tap 'Fulfill'
li23_text: Print packing slip: Send to connected printer or save as PDF
li24_text: Add tracking number: Enter carrier and tracking info
li25_text: Contact customer: Direct message or call from order screen
p7: Filter orders by status (Pending, Processing, Shipped, Delivered, Cancelled) or date range to find what you need quickly.
p8: Stay informed about important events with real-time push notifications.
li26_text: New orders: Get alerted instantly when a new order arrives
li27_text: Low stock: Warning when inventory drops below threshold
li28_text: Customer messages: Notification for new support messages
li29_text: Payment received: Confirmation when payments clear
li30_text: Sales milestones: Celebrate when you hit revenue goals
p9: Go to Settings → Notifications to customize which alerts you receive and their frequency.
p10: Respond to customer inquiries without switching to desktop.
li31_text: Unified inbox: All messages (email, chat, marketplace) in one place
li32_text: Quick replies: Use canned responses for common questions
li33_text: Photo sharing: Send images to customers (e.g., packing photos)
li34_text: Order linking: Link conversations to specific orders for context
p11: Access key performance metrics and sales reports on your device.
li35_text: Sales summary: Revenue, orders, average order value
li36_text: Top products: Best-selling items by quantity and revenue
li37_text: Traffic sources: Where your customers are coming from
li38_text: Conversion rates: Visitors to customers ratio
li39_text: Time-based filters: Daily, weekly, monthly, custom ranges
p12: Keep stock levels accurate with mobile inventory management.
li41_text: Scan barcodes or manually select products
li43_text: Confirm and sync to all sales channels
p13: Enable low-stock alerts to receive notifications when products need reordering.
p14: Continue working even without internet connection. Changes sync when you reconnect.
li44_text: View products and orders (previously loaded data)
p15_warning: Note: Creating new orders or processing payments requires an active internet connection.
p16: Customize the app experience to match your workflow.
li49_text: Language: Switch between English and Turkish
li50_text: Currency display: Choose default currency format
li53_text: Biometric login: Use Face ID or fingerprint for quick access
help_text: Having trouble with the mobile app? Contact our mobile support team.
